subtests.name: Calling StylePropertyMap.append with an unsupported property name throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with an null property name throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with a property that is not list valued throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with a shorthand property throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with an invalid CSSStyleValue throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with an invalid String value throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with a mix of valid and invalid values throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with a CSSUnparsedValue throws TypeError
Calling StylePropertyMap.append with a var ref throws TypeError
Appending a list-valued property with CSSStyleValue or String updates its values
Appending a list-valued property with list-valued string updates its values
